Body: Hello! I'd be more than happy to set up a 15 minute call to learn more about your resume needs. In addition to resume services, I provide comprehensive LinkedIn reviews and content guidance as part of most resume projects and can certainly add LinkedIn content development as well.    Happy to take a look at your resume to see what might be holding up hits on it. Formatting can definitely impact a resume.    I offer 3 types of Resume Projects:  1. Resume Refresh ($475) - taking your old resume to the next level  2. Complete Resume ($875) - showcase your professional achievements & market yourself effectively  3. Premier Resume ($1,375) - power your job search with a Complete Resume + a Job-Targeted Resume, Executive Summary, & 90 minute Job Search Consultation    Process:  + 15 minute discovery call  + You complete two worksheets to (re)discover who you are professionally  + 60 minute content review call (not included with the Resume Refresh Project)  + I create your Master Resume (and other materials based on project and enhancements selected)  + Master Resume Review call (length of time and scope of call depend on project selected)    I have reviewed over 60,000 resumes, worked with 100s of companies and hiring managers, and create winning resumes that clearly demonstrate your value. Plus, your new resume will be Applicant Tracking System (ATS) compatible.    Looking forward to the opportunity to serve you.  ~Ben~

Hi! I develop resumes, cover letters and LinkedIn profiles for professionals who are seeking new career opportunities in tech, med, sales, marketing and PR fields.    As a trained Certified Professional Resume Writer (CPRW) and Career Coach, I deliver valuable insights that capture the unique story of your career - documents that grab the attention of employers!      Today, most resumes never reach the hands of a real person and the ones that do are viewed in as little as 7 seconds to determine if you’re the right fit or not. With more and more companies relying on Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) to scan for keywords, the responsibility is on you to ensure your resume is correctly targeted.     This is where the skills of myself and team come into play. We can help you get your foot in the door and in front of hiring managers with documents that are visually appealing, keyword optimized, and a true testament of your personal brand. I help early career, mid-career, executives, and transitioning military professionals land interviews across hundreds of industries and professions.     Why not save yourself the time and frustration? Hire a professional resume writer and avoid the top mistakes I see 99% of people make when it comes to resume writing.    Visit www.theresumefix.com to view pricing, package options and testimonials. Or to get started, simply reply to this message to request a free consultation.     **FREE RESUME CRITIQUES are available**    Sincerely,    Lena Jackson  The Resume Fix

Hello! I hope you’re having a good day. I'm Gabrielle Turmelle, resume writer, career coach, and creator of the 14-day LinkedIn Mastery for Job Seekers program. I help job seekers build their LinkedIn presence and create compelling resumes, so they can get in front of recruiters, impress hiring managers, and land the perfect job for them.     A few advantages that come from working with me:  - I offer unlimited resume revisions for 90 days  - My programs and services are competitively priced  - I stay with my clients until they receive their offer letter    LinkedIn does provide a number of great courses to help you write your resume yourself. With a bit of time and patience, you could craft a beautiful and effective resume that hiring managers will appreciate.    If you find yourself staring at your Word document, unsure of what to type or how to wordsmith, consider the following tips to help you along:    - Determine exactly what it is that the hiring manager is looking for  - On your resume, show how you’d be a perfect fit for the role using evidence and metrics  - Give the hiring manager what they want to see *early* on in the document    Your goal is to generate interest and appeal as quickly as possible.    I serve recent grads to senior leaders across all industries, and I’ve helped candidates land roles within Amazon, Google, Microsoft, and many other Fortune 500 companies. If you’re ready to make an investment in your future, I’d love for you to send me a message.    Gabrielle Turmelle

Ready to THRIVE in your career? You’ll need to communicate your Career Brand Story and prioritize your professional growth. We’ll help you accelerate your career growth opportunities and thrive in the job you love.    We offer three Career Brand Story packages with Career Coaching options and a FREE 15-minute phone assessment;    ASCEND - $595  90-minute Career Coaching Session  Talent Insight Report (D.I.S.C) – 40 Page Report of Your Talents!  Market-Ready Resume  LinkedIn Career Personal Branding    BLAZE - $495  45-minute Career Coaching Session  Talent Insight Report (D.I.S.C) – 40 Page Report of Your Talents!  Market-Ready Resume  LinkedIn Career Personal Branding    TRAILBLAZER - $295  Market-Ready Resume  LinkedIn Career Personal Branding    We now offer a CAREER MARKETING PROGRAM helping you create a Referral Network Strategy to locate the best opportunities for your goals. We’ll help take care of those monotonous job applications and keep track of your progress so that you can keep your energy dedicated to the most important things. Join this 12-week program at special introductory price through 7/31 - $1200    We use positive based coaching and validated behavioral assessments that enable people to use the Science of Self™ to reveal and harness their talent and skills to be more engaged in their life, career, and calling. For EXECUTIVE COACHING please visit jeremytudor.com.    Listen to our Career Brand Story podcast: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwizo9i2wr6J_1zN4MU2Uuw/

Hi! I have plenty of experience crafting resumes for transitioning tenured client strategy/business development professionals in the tech/healthcare/business space seeking new succession.    Regarding new resume or LinkedIn profile development, I setup a process with the steps below. As a former recruiter for 10+ years, I am comfortable in understanding resume content/format/ATS relevance from the hiring manager standpoint.    I'll email information about services & the resume writing process. You send a current copy of your resume along with answers to my preliminary questionnaire contained in the introductory email. We setup a mutual time to speak about your background & clarify any outstanding questions on each end.    Once I receive the necessary information/payment, I develop the resume/coverletter (coverletter is included in the $265 cost) & will deliver the documents to your inbox within 5 business days. Upon receiving documents, you can email me any revisions for inclusion. You will be working with me directly. I do a wonderful job & my testimonials can vouch for my services accordingly:    mjwcareers.com/resume-testimonials    700+ LinkedIn recommendations, 8K+ followers on Linkedin, 100+ Google & Facebook recommendations, & have been writing resumes/coaching for 16 years    Thank you again for your time & opportunity.     Matthew Warzel, CPRW   President, MJW Careers  O: 855-YES-EMPLOYEES | warzel@mjwcareers.com | mjwcareers.com | Blog: jobstickers.com
